meta.description: RIASEC Career Framework - Holland Codes for career classification

stack_logic.description: How to read a 3-letter RIASEC superpower stack

R.name: Realistic
R.title: The Doers
inclinations: Working with tools, machinery, animals, or physical objects
dispositions: Action-oriented rather than people- or theory-focused
Often dislikes abstract work or excessive paperwork
work_characteristics: Involves physical activity and use of equipment

I.name: Investigative
I.title: The Thinkers
I.core_drive: Understanding, investigating, making sense of complexity
work_characteristics: Emphasis on thinking, analyzing, and researching

A.name: Artistic
A.title: The Creators
inclinations: Expressing oneself creatively through art, music, writing, or design

S.name: Social
S.title: The Helpers
dispositions: Skilled in verbal and social communication
work_characteristics: Often involves teamwork and helping roles
Emphasis on service and human development

E.name: Enterprising
E.title: The Persuaders
inclinations: Leading, persuading, selling ideas or products
dispositions: Enjoys status, leadership, and goal-oriented tasks
Avoids routine or highly detailed work
work_characteristics: Often involves financial or political gain

C.name: Conventional
C.title: The Organizers
inclinations: Working with data, systems, and procedures
work_characteristics: Often involves repetition and data management

RIA.description: You analyze problems deeply, build practical solutions, and enhance them with creativity.
RIA.gift: Your unique gift lies in your ability to understand complex technical challenges, create tangible solutions, and express them with innovative flair.

RIS.description: You analyze real-world problems, build solutions, and apply them to help others.
RIS.gift: Your unique gift lies in combining technical problem-solving with genuine care for people's needs.

RIE.description: You investigate how things work, build solutions, and lead others through action.
RIE.gift: Your unique gift lies in understanding systems, creating practical improvements, and mobilizing teams to implement them.

RIC.description: You think through practical problems, build solutions, and organize them reliably.
RIC.gift: Your unique gift lies in systematic troubleshooting and creating well-documented, repeatable solutions.

RAI.description: You build tangible creations guided by curiosity and investigation.
RAI.gift: Your unique gift lies in crafting physical objects or systems informed by research and innovation.

RAS.description: You build creatively and use your work to support and uplift others.
RAS.gift: Your unique gift lies in creating meaningful, handcrafted solutions that directly improve people's lives.

RAE.description: You build imaginative solutions and persuade others through visible results.
RAE.gift: Your unique gift lies in demonstrating innovation through action and inspiring others to follow.

RAC.description: You build creative ideas and bring order and precision to them.
RAC.gift: Your unique gift lies in turning imaginative concepts into organized, practical realities.

RSI.description: You build practical tools to help others, informed by thoughtful understanding.
RSI.gift: Your unique gift lies in creating solutions that serve people, backed by careful analysis.

RSA.description: You help people through hands-on building and creative expression.
RSA.gift: Your unique gift lies in supporting others through tangible, artfully crafted work.

RSE.description: You support others by building solutions and confidently leading through action.
RSE.gift: Your unique gift lies in serving communities by creating practical solutions and guiding implementation.

RSC.description: You help others using practical solutions that are well-organized.
RSC.gift: Your unique gift lies in providing reliable, systematic support through hands-on work.

REI.description: You build results-driven solutions guided by analysis and strategic thinking.
REI.gift: Your unique gift lies in creating high-impact outcomes through technical skill and business insight.

REA.description: You build bold, creative solutions and inspire others to act.
REA.gift: Your unique gift lies in demonstrating innovation and mobilizing others toward tangible results.

RES.description: You lead by building solutions that directly help and mobilize people.
RES.gift: Your unique gift lies in serving others through practical leadership and hands-on problem-solving.

REC.description: You lead through execution, structure, and reliable systems.
REC.gift: Your unique gift lies in building dependable operations and guiding teams toward consistent results.

RCI.description: You build structured systems informed by careful analysis.
RCI.gift: Your unique gift lies in creating organized, research-backed solutions that work reliably.

RCA.description: You build creative solutions and organize them for clarity and usability.
RCA.gift: Your unique gift lies in making innovative ideas accessible through careful organization.

RCS.description: You build orderly systems that help people function better.
RCS.gift: Your unique gift lies in creating well-organized tools and processes that improve people's lives.

RCE.description: You build organized solutions and influence others through dependable execution.
RCE.gift: Your unique gift lies in leading through reliable, systematic action and practical results.

IRA.description: You investigate deeply, apply hands-on experimentation, and express ideas creatively.
IRA.gift: Your unique gift lies in combining research with practical application and innovative communication.

IRS.description: You analyze real-world problems and apply your findings to help others.
IRS.gift: Your unique gift lies in translating research into practical help for people in need.

IRE.description: You think analytically and turn insights into persuasive, action-oriented outcomes.
IRE.gift: Your unique gift lies in using data and analysis to drive business decisions and lead change.

IRC.description: You analyze systems, build practical solutions, and organize them reliably.
IRC.gift: Your unique gift lies in creating well-structured, research-based systems that work consistently.

IAR.description: You explore ideas and bring them to life through tangible creation.
IAR.gift: Your unique gift lies in transforming theoretical concepts into physical or digital realities.

IAS.description: You investigate ideas and express them creatively to support others.
IAS.gift: Your unique gift lies in using research-informed creativity to help and teach others.

IAE.description: You generate creative insights and influence others through innovation.
IAE.gift: Your unique gift lies in using imaginative thinking to persuade and lead change.

IAC.description: You explore ideas creatively and organize them into clear frameworks.
IAC.gift: Your unique gift lies in structuring innovative concepts for practical application.
